ComicInfo.Characters: Black Swan,Deadpool [Wade Wilson],Mrs. Whittaker,A.I.M.,Mr. Whittaker,Rhino [Aleksei Sytsevich],Mr. O'Hirn,Ratbag,Sandi,Nijo,Outlaw [Inez Temple]
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:41:17 [Issue ID 4000-70306] urn:comicvine:4000-70306 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 16:02:36. [Issue ID 89625]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Deadpool’s healing factor is pushed to its extreme limit in his battle with Rhino! Check out Deadpool take on one of Spider-Man’s deadliest villains!
After being given a mental virus by Swan which causes him to confuse words and ruin his aim, Deadpool is hired to retrieve the Rhino's horn to make his employer more... vigoress for his young wife. After a mostly one-sided battle, made increasingly more difficult by his worsened aim, Deadpool uses Ant-Man's gas canister and shrinks Rhino. His client's wife, however, doesn't want a more energetic husband, so Deadpool, in an attempt to play marriage counselor, leaves a clean weapon for the two, thinking it would scare them into working out their problems. It does not. The issues ends with Deadpool feeding an oreo to little Rhino, who he is keeeping in a tank.
ComicInfo.Title: Healing Factor, Chapter One: I Forget
